assignments.description: It's necesarry to assign the Case Record Type to get the Record Type Picklist Values. This is needed to Retrieve the available Case Types.
assignments.name: Assign_Case_Record_Type
assignments.label: Case Record Type

assignments.description: Assign the Case's Account and other variables
assignments.name: Assign_Case_Variables
assignments.label: Assign Case Variables

assignments.description: If the Case has an existing Label, this Label is assigned to the variable to be shown in the New Case Information Screen.
assignments.name: Assign_Current_Case_Variables
assignments.label: Assign Current Case Variables

assignments.description: Assign the In Progress Status to the Case
assignments.name: Assign_In_Progress_Status_To_Case
assignments.label: Assign In Progress Status To Case

assignments.description: Assignment to fill known values to the case record variable
assignments.name: Assign_Values_For_Case_Creation
assignments.label: Assign Values For Case Creation

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'Get Account Record' if the Get Account Record Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_Get_Account_Record
assignments.label: Flow Element - Get Account Record

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'Get Case Record' if the Get Case Record Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_Get_Case_Record
assignments.label: Flow Element - Get Case Record

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'Get Case Record Type' if the Get Case Record Type Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_Get_Case_Record_Type
assignments.label: Flow Element - Get Case Record Type

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'Update_Request_Lookup_On_Associated_Case' if the 'Update Request Lookup On Associated Case' Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_Update_Request_Lookup_On_Associated_Case
assignments.label: Flow Element - Update Request Lookup On Associated Case

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'Upsert Case Record' if the Upsert Case Record Type Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_Upsert_Case_Record
assignments.label: Flow Element - Upsert Case Record

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'Upsert Request Record' if the Upsert Request Record Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_Upsert_Request_Record
assignments.label: Flow Element - Upsert Request Record

assignments.description: Fill the Flow Element with 'What_Input_Variable_Object_Is_Used' if the 'What Input Variable Object Is Used' Element fails.
assignments.name: Flow_Element_What_Input_Variable_Object_Is_Used
assignments.label: Flow Element - What Input Variable Object Is Used

assignments.description: If the Case already has a request we use that request to update.
assignments.name: Request_Id
assignments.label: Request Id

decisions.description: What is the Case Record Type of the created Case? If it is a Request and the Case does not yet have a Request, a Request record is also created.
decisions.name: Case_Record_Type_Of_Created_Case
decisions.label: Case Record Type Of Created Case

decisions.description: We should only create a new request if the request not exists. We check if the Case already have a request. Use case is during update case action.
decisions.name: Decision_Request_Exists
decisions.label: Request Exists

decisions.description: If the Case is currently New or Assigned, the Case Status should be changed to In Progress
decisions.name: Is_Case_Currently_New_Or_Assigned
decisions.label: Is Case Currently New Or Assigned?

decisions.description: What Case Type is chosen in the New Case Information Screen?
decisions.name: What_Case_Type_Is_Chosen
decisions.label: What Case Type Is Chosen

decisions.description: Is the input variable an Account (Create New Case) or a Case (Update Existing Case)?
decisions.name: What_Input_Variable_Object_Is_Used
decisions.label: What Input Variable Object Is Used

Flow.description: With this flow, a User can easily create a Case from the Account Record Page or update a new Case on the Case Record Page using a button.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: What is the Case Label, Woonstad or Stadswonen
dynamicChoiceSets.name: CaseLabel

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The Case's origin, either Email, Phone or Website
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Choice_CaseOrigin

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The Case's priority, either Low, Medium or High
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Choice_CasePriority

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The Case's type, which is a dependent picklist for Case Reason.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Choice_CaseType

formulas.description: The link to the Case record after it has been created or updated.
formulas.name: forT_CaseRecordLink

Flow.label: Screen Flow - Create/Update New Case

recordCreates.description: Upsert the case record based on input screens and default values in variable.
recordCreates.name: Upsert_Case_Record
recordCreates.label: Upsert Case Record

recordCreates.description: Create a Request record if the Case does not have one yet. Update the existing Request if the Case does have one.
recordCreates.name: Upsert_Request_Record
recordCreates.label: Upsert Request Record

recordLookups.description: Get the Account record of the Account where the Case was created
recordLookups.name: Get_Account_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Account Record

recordLookups.description: Get the Case Record Type based on the selection in the New Case Information.
recordLookups.name: GET_Case_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Case Record Type

recordRollbacks.description: If the Flow Errors we don't want to stop half way in the process. The whole process should roll back and run again.
recordRollbacks.name: Roll_Back_Records
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Records

recordUpdates.description: Update the Look-up on the Case to the (new) Request record.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Request_Lookup_On_Associated_Case
recordUpdates.label: Update Request Lookup On Associated Case

screens.description: It's needed to seperate the case type field to get the case types available for the record type.
screens.name: Case_Type
screens.label: Case Type

screens.description:
Collection information to create the new Case.
The record type selection is not scalable. We tried to use the record choice set to get the record types, but than the user get the english translation instead of the Dutch one. Besides that in the future we need to think about a solution where we can show options, based on the permission of the user.
screens.name: New_Case_Information
screens.label: New Case Information

fields.name: LabelUnknown
fields.fieldText: Based on the Account contract data, it could not be determined what the Case label should be. If known, please fill it in.

fields.name: LabelKnown
fields.fieldText: This is the label of the Case which is determined based on the contract data of this Account.

screens.description: Because of SFI-791 we created two temporary fields for Supplier (Supplier_Name_Plate__c) and Supplier Email (Supplier_Email__c) to support the name plate process on a short term. In phase 2 we will redesign the name plate process.
screens.name: New_Request_Information
screens.label: New Request Information

fields.name: Txt_AddressVisibility
fields.fieldText:
Active shipping address of requester:


{!Get_Account_Record.Full_Shipping_Street__c}

{!Get_Account_Record.Full_Shipping_Postal_Code__c}

{!Get_Account_Record.Full_Shipping_City__c}


Check if the request also applies to this address.

fields.name: Txt_SupplierSelection
fields.fieldText:
Based on the address, you determine the supplier to handle this request.


  • Management organization "Noord/Oost": Keller's IJzerhandel B.V.
  • Management organization "Zuid": Het Zuider Sleutelhuis B.V.
  • Management organization "Centrum/West": IJzerhandel Overschie
    • NOTE: requests for "Centrum/West" for specific complex 23109 go to Weijntjes Hang- En Sluitwerk

fields.name: Txt_SuccessMessageCreate
fields.fieldText: Good work {!$User.FirstName}, you have successfully created the Case.

fields.name: Txt_SuccessMessageUpdate
fields.fieldText: Good work {!$User.FirstName}, you have successfully updated the Case.

subflows.description: Publish the Flow Fault Platform Event.
subflows.name: Publish_Flow_Fault_Event
subflows.label: Publish Flow Fault Event

subflows.description: This subflow retrieves the Accounts Contract Parties from its Real Estate Contracts, which are linked to the Contract Lines.
subflows.name: Retrieve_The_Account_s_Contract_Parties
subflows.label: Retrieve The Account's Contract Parties

subflows.description: Show the generic Screen Flow Error Screen
subflows.name: Subflow_ErrorScreen
subflows.label: Screen Flow - Error Screen

textTemplates.description: Button to open the new or updated Case.
textTemplates.name: Txt_OpenRecordButton

variables.description: The record variable where information about the Case is captured.
variables.name: varR_Case

variables.description: The record variable where information about the Request is captured, which is created if the Case record type is Request.
variables.name: varR_Request

variables.description: What is the Account's Contract Party, Woonstad or Stadswonen?
variables.name: varT_AccountContractParty
